text: Destin Onka Malonga (March 16, 1988 – July 31, 2016) was a Congolese football player. He was born in Brazzaville, Congo. Malonga played professionally for MSP Batna in the Algerian Championnat National, before joined 2010 to French Division Honneur club AS Contres. After just one year he left the club and signed for Avenir Foot Lozère. Malonga died on 31 July 2016 at Vallon- Pont-d'Arc, Ardèche, France in a canoeing accident during pre-season club training.International goalkeeper Destin Onka Malonga dies in canoeing accident == References == Category:1988 births Category:2016 deaths Category:African footballers Category:Republic of the Congo people Category:Accidental deaths in France
title: Destin Onka Malonga
